title: Federal budget deficit adds to national debt

content.question: Which of the following will occur if the federal government runs a budget deficit?

choices.label: The size of the national debt will increase.
State governments will run a budget surplus to offset the federal deficit.
Interest rates will tend to decline.

content.answer: The size of the national debt will increase.

topic.text: 5.4: Government Deficits and the National Debt
